page.title: 02MY DYMCHURCH LIFE STYLE
page.content: I live about 1 kilometre from the village of Dymchurch. There are no shops around me, with the exception of a farm which sells eggs and goats milk, and a petrol station which sells sweets and garden supplies. At the back of my house there is a dyke and a field, then the R.H.D.R. train track. When I start at Southlands Secondary School I will travel by the miniature train. I am only about half a kilometre away from the sea. I have many friends living nearby.There is a waste ground where we enjoy BMX cycling,fishing and making camps. We often go down to the sea to swim and play with our dinghys in the pools. I believe that I am very lucky to have the beach and the countryside for my leisure activities.
